header.name: Sebastian Villa
header.title: Full Stack Developer
header.cta: Want to build something together? Contact me →

about.subtitle: Get To Know
about.title: About Me
about.description:
I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with 2.5 years of professional experience, specializing in creating innovative digital solutions. Currently working as a Freelancer, I previously spent 1 year and 10 months at "Compañía Digital", where I was instrumental in developing the "CD-System" platform and collaborated on multiple web projects built with this system.

My expertise encompasses a comprehensive range of technologies including:
• HTML5 • CSS3 • JavaScript (ES6+)
• Node.js • MySQL • PostgreSQL • MongoDB
• PHP • Laravel • React • React Native
• Redux • Express.js • Bootstrap • Scrum methodologies

Additionally, I have extensive DevOps experience including:
• Application deployment and server configuration
• Domain management and DNS configuration
• Server maintenance and monitoring
• CI/CD pipeline implementation
• Cloud infrastructure management
about.personalStory:
My mission as a developer goes beyond writing code. I firmly believe that technology should serve to solve real problems and improve people's lives. Every project I develop is an opportunity to create something with positive impact, whether it's facilitating business management, connecting people, or helping non-profit organizations achieve their goals.

What motivates me most is continuous learning and the challenge of finding elegant solutions to complex problems. I particularly enjoy the process of transforming ideas into reality, working in teams and collaborating with clients to understand their needs and create solutions that truly add value.

My approach is based on quality, efficiency, and always keeping the end user at the center of every technical decision. I believe the best code is not only functional but also maintainable, scalable, and easy to understand.

descriptions.netflix: Netflix clone with React, including authentication, movie catalog and favorites system.
